All Video Downloader 2023 Posting rules you should be taking care of before you start interaction on our website/application: 

Assuring you carry the rights and eligibility to post any form of content you are about to share. We never permit nudism on application/website. We won't allow posting of sexually explicit content, sexually explicit text, images, or audio content depicting extreme sexual acts such as acts of posting Content that drives traffic to pornographic online services. Please note that we may make exceptions based on artistic, educational, historical, documentary, or scientific nature, or where there are other considerable benefits to the public at large. 

We don't permit encouragement or applaud towards terrorism, formed crime scenes or hate association groups on our application/website. Attempting to sell sexual services or weapons and harmful drugs are also not permitted. We will remove reasonable threats of severity, hate arousing content/speech and the intentionally pointing of private individuals. We do not permit attacks/abuse based on skin colour, native, sex, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, religion, disability or disease. 

Graphic violence is not allowed and we may remove videos or images of intense, graphic violence to make sure our application/website stays appropriate for everyone. 

If anyone or any account is spotted doing the above restricted activities they can be booked and arrested for the same. If viewers spot any violations of the above rules they have the right to report the content to us by using the report feature given in our application/ website.

(This feature is only for Android Oreo and Above) 
 When enabled it hides "albumArt.jpg" files. So that they wont annoy you by appearing in Galley. 
 [Please turn off , if your music player doesn't recognize AlbumArt] Enabling this will automatically deletes the "albumArt.jpg" files after usage. 
 [Please turn off , if your music player doesn't recognize AlbumArt] Note : If your Download got stuck up in Middle.
 Please Force Close the app and try downloading again.
 Also check weather you have given all Permissions or not.
 I will fix this issue in next release. Streaming is disabled in this build due to few unknown bugs. 
 It will be enabled in the next update, which will be released soon. Instructions:
 Use the above Search bar to Search songs and the results appear here.
 Use Browse tab to browse songs directly from Saavn web UI.
 All downloaded songs will be saved to All Video Downloader & Saver_DOWNLOADS folder.
 Check out Downloads and More page for further info. Enabling this will store the downloaded music files in separate folders, named as per their Album name [Only for Android Oreo and Above]Try disabling this if you encounter random force closes in the app while downloading. Enabling this will save .lrc files when ever possible to reduce loading time for future playbacks. [Experimental]This will temporarily store the required audio data locally to reduce buffer time during the next playback. However, this might occupy some of your internal storage space.
Note : This is a initial release of the app. So its common to have Bugs and Lags in the app. For further development of the app please report the bugs you find. Want to get in touch with me ? (Click here) Click here to join our Telegram Group Give me a Star(⭐) on GitHub Read FAQ's here... Read Disclaimer Click here to Report a Bug or Suggest a feature.(use Gmail) Downloading Copyrighted music might be illegal in Some countries.
 © All Songs,images and Saavn™ belongs to JioSaavn. by IDE I am an undergraduate student who enjoys making these kinds of projects in free time.
 You can encourage me by buying me a coffee which motivates me to work consistently on this project and provide you regular updates with awesome new features.
 I need your support to keep the app going forward.
Thank you for showing your love towards the app.
Enjoy the complete Ad-free experience. Report here if you are still getting ads with in the app.(use G-Mail)

Next Skip Start A friend for you A audio and video call app where
your friends live. Judgement -free If you are in a bad mood and need someone to talk
to, strangers who are ready to be your friends are
here for you 24/7 anytime,anywhere. Celebrate diffrences We are all different and have our own worries,
goals and obstacles share them by chatting with
strangers by making them your friends. Set your profile picture Choose from device Personal Details Enter full name Set Username Enter your age Male Female Select Your Gender Get started Start conversation Connect on video call, Audio call or chat with strangers Profile Username Full name Gender Age Discard changes Video call Open Close Live Video Call - Meet
Strangers Settings Coins Go Pro More Apps T&C Coins feature will be shown
in updated version. Allow Notification Sound Vibration Do not disturb DND Notification You need to dress for a video call as you would for an in-person meeting – or as close as possible. We may be working at home, but first impressions still matter. What you wear is nearly as important as what you say. As you are at home, it may be ok to take it down a notch, but not too far. More cashmere sweater than varsity sweatshirt. If you are in any doubt, always dress up, never down. Know that if you are talking with the CEO of a bank, and they expect a tie at all times, you will still need to wear a tie! Dress appropriately professional for the type of video call you are on. In an ideal world, the best room in your house to conduct a video call will also have exceptional lighting. Failing that, cheat. Get two lamps and position them on either side of your desk. That way, your face will be illuminated from both sides, and you will avoid unnatural shadows. Video quality is not always the best, so every trick will help you make a good impression. Position your webcam at eye level or higher. This way, you will look directly into the camera, not down, and look more natural. If this means you need to stack your laptop or screen on some books, do it. Just make sure it is not balanced precariously. You would not want it to fall over mid-video call. Make sure to look at the camera as much as possible or at the screen close to where the camera is. It will appear as direct eye contact. Avoid looking at yourself in the small frame of the corner of your screen. While we do not have much control over audio quality in a video call, you will sound better in a quiet room. Keep in mind that headphones can help you cut ambient noise and ensure you hear what is being said. Remember that if you can not hear the discussion, you will likely answer incorrectly when called on. Make sure your headphone mic is working correctly too. You may need to try a couple of headphones to find the one that has the clearest sound. Look at the background that will be in your video interviews. Is it a direct eyeline to your hamster cage or your bathroom? Both of those are distracting in different ways and will look unprofessional. Avoid that by making sure your background is a plain wall or a more professional looking space. Do not have that option available? If you are on a Zoom call, you can set up a virtual background to display an image as your background during the call. Shutterstock also has several free virtual backgrounds you can download and use. Once you have your set up in place, do a trial run with a friend or family member. Make sure your webcam, microphone, and headphones are working correctly. Make any adjustments you need to in your trial call so you are ready to go when your meeting starts. Make sure you have a good internet connection. If your internet is likely to cut out, make sure no one else in the house is downloading all 16 seasons of Greys Anatomy at the same time as your video call. Do not let your internet connection let you down your preparations. As a courtesy to others, know how to mute your microphone. Unmute yourself quickly when you need to speak and put mute back on afterwards. This will ensure no random outside notices make their way onto your video call. Even though people will only be seeing the top half of your body, you still need to be aware of your body language. Sit up straight in your chair with your feet on the ground. Keep the fidgeting down to a minimum. Know what you look like before you get on the video call – do not check your teeth once you are connected. Do not forget that you are on camera. Part of looking good means acting as you would in person. Pay close attention to your video call settings and the expression on your face. We can all still see you! As with regular meetings, try to clear the room you are in of everything that will distract you. Turn off the radio and TV. Close the door so family/roommates, children or pets do not interrupt you mid-call. But if they do, roll with it as best you can. This is an unusual time, and we are often working in less than ideal home office situations. It may put a smile on a coworkers face to see your cat appear on-screen for a while. If your child needs to know, “Why are we having spaghetti for the third night in a row?” politely excuse yourself out loud, hit mute, and try to come back as quick as possible. Just remember you are still on camera, and the video call is still going. Dress appropriately Fill your Face with Light Raise your Camera Find a quiet Place Choose a neutral Background Check your tech Body Language Keep clear of Distractions Room 1(Random) Online : 0 Room 2(Random) Room 3(only boys) Room 4(only girls) Audio call Connect on audio call with strangers Room1 Random Room2 Room3 Room4 Only Boys Only Girls Premium feature will be shown
